pObjectDescr Class Reference
[RigidBody]

Describes a rigid body. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

  • HullType hullType
    The shape type of the body. Default = HT_Sphere.
  • float density
    The shape type of the body. Default = 1.0f.
  • VxVector massOffset
    Translates the mass center after the body is created in local space.
  • VxVector shapeOffset
    Translates the pivot after the body is created in local space.
  • VxVector pivotOffsetLinear
    Translates the pivot after the body is created in local space.
  • CK_ID pivotOffsetReference
    Translates the pivot after the body is created in local space.
  • VxVector pivotOffsetAngular
    Translates the pivot after the body is created in local space.
  • BodyFlags flags
    Describes several properties. See BodyFlags. Default = 0.
  • bool hirarchy
    Will parse the entities hierarchy for additional sub shapes. Child objects needs to have the physic object attribute attached. Default = false.
  • float newDensity
    If there are sub shape attached, pRigidBodie::addSubShape will call pRigidBody::updateMassFromShapes(). Default = 0.0f.
  • float totalMass
    If there are sub shape attached, pRigidBodie::addSubShape will call pRigidBody::updateMassFromShapes(). Default = 0.0f.

Collision

  • pGroupsMask groupsMask
    Sets 128-bit mask used for collision filtering. See comments for pGroupsMask.
  • float skinWidth
    Adds an additional offset for collision response.
  • int collisionGroup
    The collision group the body belongs to. Default = 0.

CCD Settings

  • float ccdMotionThresold
  • int ccdFlags
  • CK_ID ccdMeshReference
  • float ccdScale

Damping

  • float linearDamping
    the linear damping.
  • float angularDamping
    the angular damping.

Sleeping Settings

  • float linearSleepVelocity
  • float angularSleepVelocity
  • float sleepingEnergyThresold

Optimization

  • int solverIterations
  • int dominanceGroups
  • int compartmentID

Mass

  • VxVector massOffsetLinear
  • VxVector massOffsetAngular
  • CK_ID massOffsetReference

Detailed Description

Describes a rigid body.

!This is used by pFactory::createBody() and pRigidBody::addSubShape() only.

Describes several properties. See BodyFlags. Default = 0.

bool pObjectDescr::hirarchy

Will parse the entities hierarchy for additional sub shapes. Child objects needs to have the physic object attribute attached. Default = false.

float pObjectDescr::newDensity

If there are sub shape attached, pRigidBodie::addSubShape will call pRigidBody::updateMassFromShapes(). Default = 0.0f.

If there are sub shape attached, pRigidBodie::addSubShape will call pRigidBody::updateMassFromShapes(). Default = 0.0f.
